attributes.action: STOP SCREWING THE POOR INTO THE GROUND AND GIVE INFLATION RISES AND STOP GOVERNMENT WASTE OF MILLIONS.
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT TO SEE A RETURN TO INFLATION RISES FOR THE POOR INSTEAD OF SCREWING THEM INTO THE GROUND WHILE THE GOVERNMENT WASTES HUNDREDS OF MILLIONS FROM VARIOUS DEPTS, PEOPLE SHOULD HAVE A REASONABLE PENSION IN THERE LAST YEARS OF LIFE AFTER GIVING TO THE COUNTRY FOR YEARS THIS CAN BE PAID FOR WITH THE WASTE ABOVE.

ALSO THE ONES ON BENEFITS THROUGH NO FAULT OF THERE OWN, THE RICH HAS CAUSED MANY ISSUES AND THE WORKING CLASS HAVE TO SUFFER.

MP`S AND THE ONES IN GOVERNMENT WHO ARE RICH WITH A NUMBER OF PROPERTIES HAVE NOT GOT A CLUE WITH THE WORKING CLASS AND HOW THEY HAVE TO LIVE SO DO NOT RUB THEM INTO THE GROUND AS ABOVE PLEASE.
